title: Strengthening Service Quality Competencies: Crowdsourcing-Based Co-Design to Enhance Language Education Content

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational instructional design principles and language education theories
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can collect drafts of language education content in three or more languages and integrate feedback using crowdsourcing platform features.
Through a co-design process, learners can develop two types of learner-customized language activities and conduct usability testing.
Learners can improve educational material prototypes through collaboration with five or more peers/actual learners using digital tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
